page.title: 15LOCAL NEWS IN CLATFORD
page.content: Our local{MEDIA}consists of:- The Advertiser,Echo and the Avon Advertiser.We took news from the Advertiser which is connected with our area. The news we collected was from the papers dated 21st June and 28th June 1985.The news goes like this:- Fifteen year old Andrew Sibley who lives in {GOODWORTH CLATFORD}is going to Sri Lanka to help in a Clearwater project with the scouts. There is an item concerning a meeting held on a Saturday evening in 1885 at the White Lion Inn in{ {WHERWELL.} There is an advertisment for houses ranging from Â£72,000-Â£94,000. There are two bus services that concern our area the first is Goodworth-{ANDOVER} and the second is Wherwell-Andover. They are run by the Hants/ Dorset Co..
